campus_life.summary: This text provides a comprehensive overview of a campus's offerings, highlighting various aspects of student life and institutional resources. It details campus facilities such as the hostel, library, and transportation, alongside extracurricular activities like societies, clubs, the National Cadet Corps (NCC), and the National Service Scheme (NSS). The information also includes sports, recreation, cafeteria services, healthcare, and cultural events such as Unifest and the Smart India Hackathon 2022.
